Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Blue Lake Center is conveniently located off U.S. Highway 280 at the intersection of I-459. Located near restaurants and retail at The Summit and Shops at the Colonnade, this Class A office building is in a prime location on the 280 corridor.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Blue Lake Center is a multi-tenant building located in a wooded setting off U.S. Hwy 280. The property features card-access security system, on-site maintenance, fiber optics capability, and service entrance with loading dock. Tenants are provided free surface parking and access to a building conference center and micro-market.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Class A Office Building on Highway 280 Corridor

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Suite has elevator lobby exposure and features atrium windows in the main conference room.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located at the I-459 intersection, Colonnade is located near numerous restaurants and retail including the Shops of Colonnade and The Summit. Numerous hotels are located within walking distance including Hampton Inn, Fairfield Inn & Suites and Courtyard by Marriott; as well as multiple banking facilities nearby.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The multi-tenant, mix-use buildings at Colonnade Office Park are located on a 106-acre development. Tenants enjoy access to an on-site fitness facility, measured jogging path, regularly scheduled food trucks and a fuel truck program. The property provides free surface parking, on-site management and maintenance, card-access security system, fiber optics capability and service elevators and loading docks.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Easy access to major arteries including Highway 31 and I-459
Numerous restaurants, retail, hotels, and banking nearby

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located at Riverchase Parkway and Highway 31 South with easy access to major arteries including I-459. Restaurants, hotels, banking, and retail, including Riverchase Galleria, are located within a 1-mile radius of Riverchase Center.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 8 single-story buildings situated on 80 acres in the Southern Market. The property has free surface parking and on-site maintenance. Tenants enjoy the convenience of regularly scheduled food trucks.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Conveniently located in Homewood at the Highway 31/Highway 280 junction

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Conveniently located at the Highway 31/Highway 280 junction. Located in the City of Homewood with easy access to restaurants and retailers in Downtown Birmingham, Downtown Homewood, Mountain Brook Village, and English Village.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Space features executive and private offices, open workstations, a conference room, and a copier/work room. 

Building provides free, surface parking, Micro-Market, and secured keycard access.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Conveniently located at the Highway 280/Highway 31 interchange. Close proximity to Downtown Birmingham and Downtown Homewood restaurants and entertainment.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
5,629 SF office space available; lease expires 4/30/2024. 
Building features free surface parking, 24-hour access, outdoor eating area, on-site deli, building health club, common conference room, and on-site property management.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: 10th Floor space available;  can be subdivided

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located near the Highway 31/I-459 intersection minutes from I-65. Convenient location in Hoover adjacent to The Galleria Mall and The Wynfrey Hotel.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Space features multiple private offices and large, open work areas; conference rooms, storage and work rooms, and a coffee station.

Building features on-site management and engineering, 24-hour security, on-site fitness center, common tenant conference room, and shuttle
to/from Birmingham Airport.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Sublease Available at The Offices at 3000 Riverchase

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Convenient access to Red Mountain Expressway, I-20/59, and I-65

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Colonial Plaza is located in the heart of Birminghams Central Business District within walking distance to numerous restaurants, hotels, entertainment venues, government entities, and banking options. Conveniently located with easy access to Red Mountain Expressway, I-20/59, and I-65.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Property features covered parking in attached deck with additional parking available in multiple nearby public lots and decks, as well as street parking. Tenants can enjoy the on-site fitness facility and have 24-hour security and key-card access. Offices can be equipped with advanced fiber-optic telecommunications. Maintenance personnel located on-site.
